message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is my bottom line. This product is worth every penny at that price.
